# Kamero Geo Location API

> Free, open-source API to get user geolocation by IP address. No API key required.

## Quick Start

GET https://geo.kamero.ai/api/geo

## Response Format

```json
{
  "city": "San Francisco",
  "country": "US",
  "countryRegion": "CA",
  "latitude": "37.7749",
  "longitude": "-122.4194",
  "region": "sfo1"
}
```

## Fields

- city: City name
- country: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code
- countryRegion: ISO 3166-2 region/state code
- latitude: Latitude coordinate
- longitude: Longitude coordinate
- region: Vercel Edge Network region

## JavaScript Example

```javascript
const response = await fetch("https://geo.kamero.ai/api/geo");
const location = await response.json();
console.log(location.city, location.country);
```

## Python Example

```python
import requests
response = requests.get("https://geo.kamero.ai/api/geo")
location = response.json()
print(location["city"], location["country"])
```

## cURL Example

```bash
curl https://geo.kamero.ai/api/geo
```

## Key Features

- No API key required
- No rate limits
- Free and open source (MIT License)
- Sub-50ms response times globally
- CORS enabled for all origins
- Powered by Vercel Edge Network

## Self-Hosting

Deploy your own instance:
https://vercel.com/new/clone?repository-url=https://github.com/kamero-ai/geo-location-api

## Links

- Website: https://geo.kamero.ai
- Documentation: https://geo.kamero.ai/docs
- GitHub: https://github.com/kamero-ai/geo-location-api
- Organization: https://kamero.ai
